items.sentence: What\'s the weather like in the summer in your country?
What\'s your favorite cheese to eat when drinking wine?
What\'s your favorite song to sing with young children?
Tom speaks French better than anyone else in the class.
Tom spent all day designing a website for a new client.
Tom staggered into the room, carrying a bottle of beer.
Tom started the coffee brewing, then checked his email.
You should watch that movie if you get the opportunity.
There are still many stupid laws that are on the books.
There is an urgent need for improved living conditions.
Tom usually watches the news while he\'s eating dinner.
Tom doesn\'t know what to say to make Mary feel better.
Tom doesn\'t often help his mother hang up the laundry.
Tom doesn\'t remember doing what everybody says he did.
I don\'t think that Tom will be in Australia next week.
Doesn\'t Tom need an oven? Let\'s give him our old one.
Tom dropped out of college and started his own company.
Tom is having an allergic reaction to something he ate.
Tom is suspected of being involved in the bank robbery.
Tom acted as the boss whenever the boss wasn\'t around.
